settings.title: Subscription widget
settings.description: Subscription widget will only show on products that have a subscription plan attached to them. [Learn more about theme settings for subscriptions](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/purchase-options/shopify-subscriptions/setup#display-subscriptions-on-your-online-store)
settings.product_description: The settings above show options for the selected product. The current product selected has a subscription plan.
settings.subscription_policy_url_info: Select an existing page or paste an external link to display subscription policy.
